annotations.description: Thanks to David Wondrich and his genius book Imbibe, we know a lot about the likely Origin of the Tom Collins which actually started it’s life as the John Co...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: John Collins aka Tom Collins

textContent:
2oz. (60ml) Genever Gin
.75oz. (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz. (22.5ml) Simple Syrup 
1.5oz. (45ml) Soda Water
Lemon and Cherry Garnish

Shake and pour into glass over ice.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hawI5j_TPHU
title: John Collins
